items.title: Raytheon SVA Patriot Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship awards two U.S. Army student veterans with $10,000 scholarships.

items.title: General Dynamics SVA Community College Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship awards 5 student veterans attending community colleges with $2,000.

items.title: Google SVA Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship will award eight student veterans with $10,000 each for those  pursuing a degree in computer science or related fields.

items.title: NBCUniversal SVA Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship will award two student veterans with $12,000 and is open to all student veterans from community college students to PhD candidates.

items.title: PNC SVA Serving with Integrity Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship awards 2 student veterans pursuing a degree from an accredited institution of higher learning in finance, business administration, or related fields with $10,000.

items.title: The Walt Disney Company SVA STEM Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship awards three students pursuing a degree from an accredited institution of higher learning in a designated Science, Technology, Engineering, or Mathematics (STEM) program with $10,000.

items.title: BP America - SVA STEM Scholarship
items.description: This scholarship awards three students pursuing degrees in the areas of Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) with $10,000.
